doc.title: Nel ventre della balena
doc.plot: Veronica, aged 15, is a high school of the arts' student. She doesn't get along very well with most of her classmates but she's attracted to Giulia, a lonely and problematic girl. Giulia learns to like Veronica and introduces her to disco bars and clubs. A world where a 15 year old girl may feel free to act as an adult. There, Veronica understands Giulia's secret. A secret that lets Veronica realize things about herself she couldn't even imagine before.
